languages.text: Согласно новой доктрине пораженные в правах элементы будут сервиторизироваться или утилизироваться на опасных работах.
According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.
languages.original_text: Согласно новой доктрине пораженные в правах элементы будут сервиторизироваться или утилизироваться на опасных работах.

traits.locale_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of in hazardous work.
According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of in hazardous work.
According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.
According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.
According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

languages.text: Selon la nouvelle doctrine, les personnes privées de leurs droits seront servitorisées ou éliminées en leur confiant des travaux dangereux.
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

traits.locale_text: Selon la nouvelle doctrine, les personnes privées de leurs droits seront servitorisées ou éliminées en leur confiant des travaux dangereux.

languages.text: 新しいドクトリンによれば、権利を剥奪された者たちは、サーヴィター化されるか、危険な労働を通じて処分されることになる。
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

traits.locale_text: 新しいドクトリンによれば、権利を剥奪された者たちは、サーヴィター化されるか、危険な労働を通じて処分されることになる。

languages.text: 根据新的信条，被剥夺权利的居民会被改造成机仆，或被派遣完成危险的工作。
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

traits.locale_text: 根据新的信条，被剥夺权利的居民会被改造成奴工，或被派遣完成危险的工作。

languages.text: Según la nueva doctrina, los desheredados serán servidorizados o eliminados mediante trabajos peligrosos.
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

traits.locale_text: Según la nueva doctrina, los desheredados serán servidorizados o eliminados mediante trabajos peligrosos.

languages.text: Gemäß der neuen Doktrin werden die Entrechteten servitorisiert oder durch gefährliche Arbeit nach und nach entsorgt.
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.

traits.locale_text: Gemäß der neuen Doktrin werden die Entrechteten servitorisiert oder durch gefährliche Arbeit nach und nach entsorgt.

languages.text: Yeni öğretiye göre haklarından olanlar, hizmetörleştirilerek yahut tehlikeli işlerde çalıştırılarak toplumdan ayıklanacak.
languages.original_text: According to the new doctrine, the disenfranchised will be servitorised or disposed of through hazardous work.
